questions.question_text: jevā je Bhagwān tathā te Bhagwānnā bhakta sādhu tenu māhātmya samaje tene shu bākī rahyu nahī?
questions.explanation: pratyaksh evā je Bhagwān tathā te Bhagwānnā bhakta sādhu tenu māhātmya samaje tene kalyānnā mārgmā kāīye samajavu bākī rahyu nahī.

questions.question_text: Game tevo pāpī hoy ne ant same jo tene kayā nāmnu uchchāran thây to te sarva pāp thakī chhūtīne Brahmamoholne vishe nivās kare
questions.explanation: Game tevo pāpī hoy ne ant same jo tene 'Swāminārāyan evā nāmnu uchchāran thây to te sarva pāp thakī chhūtīne Brahmamoholne vishe nivās kare

questions.question_text: Swāminārāyan nāmnā mantra jevo bījo koī mantra kevo nathī?
questions.explanation: Swāminārāyan nāmnā mantra jevo bījo koī mantra āj baļiyo nathī

questions.question_text: Swāminārāyan mantre shunā bandhan chhūtī jāy chhe?
questions.explanation: e mantre kāļ, karma, māyānu bandhan chhūtī jāy chhe, evo bahu baliyo e mantra chhe.
